target_content: Recycling or preparing for re-use 65% of all packaging waste by 2025, 70% by 2030

target_content: by 31 December 2030, in each safe and secure parking area at least four publicly accessible recharging stations dedicated to heavy-duty electric vehicles with an individual power output of at least 100 kW are deployed
justification: This target is assigned to Electric Vehicle Charging as it specifically mentions the deployment of recharging stations for heavy-duty electric vehicles.

target_content: by 31 December 2030, in each safe and secure parking area at least four publicly accessible recharging stations dedicated to heavy-duty electric vehicles with an individual power output of at least 100 kW are deployed

target_content: Reduce landfill to a maximum of 10% of municipal waste

justification: This target is assigned to Waste Reduction as it specifically mentions reducing landfill waste, which is a key aspect of waste management.

target_content: By 2030, the share of renewable energy in the electricity mix should double to 55-60%, and projections show a share of around 84% by 2050. The remaining gap should be covered by other low-carbon options
justification: This target is assigned to Renewable Energy as it specifically mentions increasing the share of renewable energy in the electricity mix.

target_content: By 2030, the share of renewable energy in the electricity mix should double to 55-60%, and projections show a share of around 84% by 2050. The remaining gap should be covered by other low-carbon options
justification: This target is also assigned to Low-Carbon Energy as it mentions covering the remaining gap with other low-carbon options.

target_content: Member States shall take measures to achieve a sustained reduction in the consumption of lightweight plastic carrier bags on their territory. A sustained reduction is achieved if the annual consumption does not exceed 40 lightweight plastic carrier bags per person, or the equivalent target in weight, by 31 December 2025, and subsequently by 31 December in each year thereafter
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Plastic Reduction as it specifically mentions reducing the consumption of lightweight plastic carrier bags.

target_content: Member States shall take measures to achieve a sustained reduction in the consumption of lightweight plastic carrier bags on their territory. A sustained reduction is achieved if the annual consumption does not exceed 40 lightweight plastic carrier bags per person, or the equivalent target in weight, by 31 December 2025, and subsequently by 31 December in each year thereafter
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is also assigned to Circular Economy as it aims to reduce plastic waste, which is a key aspect of a circular economy.

target_content: Member States should aim to achieve an indicative Union-wide food waste reduction target of 30 % by 2025 and 50 % by 2030
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Food Waste Reduction as it specifically mentions reducing food waste.

target_content: Member States should aim to achieve an indicative Union-wide food waste reduction target of 30 % by 2025 and 50 % by 2030

target_content: From 2019, the minimum collection rate to be achieved annually shall be 65 % of the average weight of EEE placed on the market in the three preceding years in the Member State concerned, or alternatively 85 % of WEEE generated on the territory of that Member State.
thematic_area: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
justification: This target is assigned to Electronic Waste Collection as it specifically mentions collecting electronic waste.

target_content: Synthetic aviation fuels are expected to play a role in the decarbonisation of the sector already by 2030 and should contribute to at least 35% of the aviation fuel mix by 2050, according to the EC proposal for ReFuelEU Aviation
justification: This target is assigned to Sustainable Aviation as it specifically mentions decarbonizing the aviation sector.

target_content: (urban ecosystems) Member States shall achieve thereafter an increasing trend in the total national area of urban green space, including through integration of urban green space into buildings and infrastructure, in urban ecosystem areas, determined in accordance with Article 11(2b), measured every six years after 31 December 2030, until a satisfactory level identified in accordance with Article 11(3) is reached
justification: This target is assigned to Urban Green Space as it specifically mentions increasing the area of urban green space.

target_content: Achieve a climate-resilient society status, fully adapted to the unavoidable impacts of climate change

target_content: Ensure Fair, inclusive and ethical value chains. Improve working conditions, ensure occupation health and safety. Ensure workers’ social protection and housing conditions, promote socially responsible production methods, Mitigate the socio-economic consequences impacting the food chain and ensure that the key principles enshrined in the European Pillar of Social Rights are respected, especially when it comes to precarious, seasonal and undeclared workers.
thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
justification: This target is assigned to Social Responsibility as it specifically mentions ensuring fair and ethical value chains and promoting socially responsible production methods.

thematic_area: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
justification: This target is also assigned to Sustainable Agriculture as it aims to promote socially responsible production methods and ensure fair working conditions in the agricultural sector.

target_content: Each Member State shall ensure that at least 3 % of the total floor area of heated and/or cooled buildings (of buildings which have a total useful floor area of over 250 m2) that are owned by public bodies is renovated each year to be transformed into at least nearly zero-energy buildings or zero-emission buildings in accordance with Article 9 of Directive 2010/31/EU
justification: This target is assigned to Energy Efficiency as it specifically mentions renovating buildings to improve energy efficiency.

target_content: Each Member State shall ensure that at least 3 % of the total floor area of heated and/or cooled buildings (of buildings which have a total useful floor area of over 250 m2) that are owned by public bodies is renovated each year to be transformed into at least nearly zero-energy buildings or zero-emission buildings in accordance with Article 9 of Directive 2010/31/EU

justification: This target is assigned to Ecosystem Restoration as it specifically mentions putting in place restoration measures for land areas and ecosystems.

justification: This target is assigned to Low-Carbon Transportation as it specifically mentions reducing greenhouse gas emissions in the maritime sector.

target_content: The multimodal Trans-European Transport Network (TEN-T) equipped for sustainable and smart transport with high speed connectivity will be operational for the core network, by 2030. It will be operational for the comprehensive network, by 2050.

target_content: From 1 January 2020, this Regulation sets an EU fleet-wide target of 95 g CO2/km for the average emissions of new passenger cars and an EU fleet-wide target of 147 g CO2/km for the average emissions of new light commercial vehicles registered in the Union, as measured until 31 December 2020 in accordance with Regulation (EC) No 692/2008 together with Implementing Regulations (EU) 2017/1152 and (EU) 2017/1153, and from 1 January 2021 measured in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2017/1151.
justification: This target is assigned to Low-Carbon Transportation as it specifically mentions reducing CO2 emissions from new passenger cars and light commercial vehicles.

target_content: From 1 January 2020, this Regulation sets an EU fleet-wide target of 95 g CO2/km for the average emissions of new passenger cars and an EU fleet-wide target of 147 g CO2/km for the average emissions of new light commercial vehicles registered in the Union, as measured until 31 December 2020 in accordance with Regulation (EC) No 692/2008 together with Implementing Regulations (EU) 2017/1152 and (EU) 2017/1153, and from 1 January 2021 measured in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2017/1151.

justification: This target is assigned to Electric Vehicle Charging as it specifically mentions deploying publicly accessible recharging pools for light-duty vehicles.

target_content: (agricultural ecosystems) Member States shall put in place restoration measures which shall aim to ensure that the common farmland bird index at national level based on the species specified in Annex V reaches the following levels: (a) 110 by 2030, 120 by 2040 and 130 by 2050, for Member States listed in Annex V with historically more depleted populations of farmland birds, (b) 105 by 2030, 110 by 2040 and 115 by 2050, for Member States listed in Annex V with historically less depleted populations of farmland birds.
justification: This target is assigned to Biodiversity Conservation as it specifically mentions restoring agricultural ecosystems and conserving farmland bird populations.

target_content: (agricultural ecosystems) Member States shall put in place restoration measures which shall aim to ensure that the common farmland bird index at national level based on the species specified in Annex V reaches the following levels: (a) 110 by 2030, 120 by 2040 and 130 by 2050, for Member States listed in Annex V with historically more depleted populations of farmland birds, (b) 105 by 2030, 110 by 2040 and 115 by 2050, for Member States listed in Annex V with historically less depleted populations of farmland birds.
justification: This target is also assigned to Environmental Protection as it aims to protect and preserve agricultural ecosystems.
